card.name: Accelerate
card.ability:
Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"I've seen lightning move slower."
—Nomad sentry

card.name: Acorn Harvest
card.ability:
Put two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Flashback—{1}{G}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Alter Reality
card.ability:
Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
10/4/2004 : Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
10/4/2004 : It can't change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
10/4/2004 : It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
10/4/2004 : You choose the words to change on resolution.
10/4/2004 : Changing the text of a spell will not allow you to change the targets of the spell because the targets were chosen when the spell was cast. The text change will (probably) cause it to be countered since the targets will be illegal.
10/4/2004 : If you change the text of a spell which is to become a permanent, the permanent will retain the text change until the effect wears off.

card.name: Ambassador Laquatus
card.ability: {3}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
card.flavor:
"He smiles with poisoned lips."
—Empress Llawan

card.name: Angel of Retribution
card.ability: Flying, first strike
card.flavor: Bitter vengeance never glowed so bright nor sang so sweet.

card.name: Anurid Scavenger
card.ability:
Protection from black
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Anurid Scavenger unless you put a card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
card.flavor: Krosa's topmost bottom feeder.

card.name: Aquamoeba
card.ability: Discard a card: Switch Aquamoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.
card.flavor: Some tides need no moon.
card.ruling:
4/15/2013 : Effects that switch power and toughness apply after all other effects that change power and/or toughness, regardless of which effect was created first.
4/15/2013 : Switching a creature’s power and toughness twice (or any even number of times) effectively returns the creature to the power and toughness it had before any switches.

card.name: Arrogant Wurm
card.ability:
Trample
Madness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
card.flavor: It's hard to be humble when the whole world is bite size.

card.name: Aven Trooper
card.ability:
Flying
{2}{W}, Discard a card: Aven Trooper gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: The very skies seethe with the aven's hatred for the Cabal.

card.name: Balshan Collaborator
card.ability:
Flying
{B}: Balshan Collaborator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
"Power, gold, crackers—every bird has its price."
—Chainer, dementia master

card.name: Balthor the Stout
card.ability:
Other Barbarian creatures get +1/+1.
{R}: Another target Barbarian creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
"I like to think of him as concentrated barbarian."
—Kamahl, pit fighter
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The Legend rule only applies to two Legends with identical names. If the names are similar, but different, the rule does not apply.

card.name: Barbarian Outcast
card.ability: When you control no Swamps, sacrifice Barbarian Outcast.
card.flavor:
"We offer power to anyone willing to take it. Sadly, few are unburdened enough by their prejudices to accept."
—Cabal surgeon

card.name: Basking Rootwalla
card.ability:
{1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
card.ruling: 2/1/2006 : If this card's ability is activated by one player, then another player takes control of it on the same turn, the second player can't activate its ability that turn.

card.name: Boneshard Slasher
card.ability:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Boneshard Slasher gets +2/+2 and has "When Boneshard Slasher becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Breakthrough
card.ability: Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.
card.flavor: The ideas came flooding in so fast that they couldn't all be contained.

card.name: Cabal Coffers
card.ability: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.
card.flavor: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun—and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

card.name: Cabal Ritual
card.ability:
Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
card.flavor:
"Each syllable chills your veins. Each word rattles your mind."
—Cabal Patriarch

card.name: Cabal Surgeon
card.ability: {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor: "Clerics give up when their patients die. Can I help it if I'm more compassionate?"

card.name: Cabal Torturer
card.ability:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Threshold — {3}{B}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Carrion Rats
card.ability: Whenever Carrion Rats attacks or blocks, any player may exile a card from his or her graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Rats assigns no combat damage this turn.
card.flavor:
"Just what I need—more competition."
—Cabal grave robber

card.name: Carrion Wurm
card.ability: Whenever Carrion Wurm attacks or blocks, any player may exile three cards from his or her graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Wurm assigns no combat damage this turn.
card.flavor: Since it eats only carrion, sometimes it needs to make some from scratch.

card.name: Centaur Chieftain
card.ability:
Haste
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Centaur Chieftain has "When Centaur Chieftain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn."

card.name: Centaur Veteran
card.ability:
Trample
{G}, Discard a card: Regenerate Centaur Veteran.
card.flavor: He wears his scars like badges of honor, warning his foes that he's not easily defeated.

card.name: Cephalid Aristocrat
card.ability: Whenever Cephalid Aristocrat becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
card.flavor: It's easy to tell the difference between the devious cephalids and the trustworthy ones. The trustworthy ones are dead.

card.name: Cephalid Illusionist
card.ability:
Whenever Cephalid Illusionist becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
{2}{U}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control this turn.

card.name: Cephalid Sage
card.ability: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Cephalid Sage has "When Cephalid Sage enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards."

card.name: Cephalid Snitch
card.ability: Sacrifice Cephalid Snitch: Target creature loses protection from black until end of turn.
card.flavor: The cautious are wary of their enemies. The wise are also wary of their friends.

card.name: Cephalid Vandal
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a shred counter on Cephalid Vandal. Then put the top card of your library into your graveyard for each shred counter on Cephalid Vandal.

card.name: Chainer, Dementia Master
card.ability:
Nightmare creatures get +1/+1.
{B}{B}{B}, Pay 3 life: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is black and is a Nightmare in addition to its other creature types.
When Chainer, Dementia Master leaves the battlefield, exile all Nightmares.

card.name: Chainer's Edict
card.ability:
Target player sacrifices a creature.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor: The pits have their own form of mercy.

card.name: Churning Eddy
card.ability: Return target creature and target land to their owners' hands.
card.flavor:
"Magic is like the tide—both ebb, both flow, and both serve my whims."
—Empress Llawan

card.name: Circular Logic
card.ability:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Cleansing Meditation
card.ability:
Destroy all enchantments.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all enchantments, then return all cards in your graveyard destroyed this way to the battlefield.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Auras returning to the battlefield are placed on any legal permanent of your choice. Doing this does not target the permanent. If there is no legal permanent for an Aura, it remains in the graveyard.
8/1/2005 : Auras returning to the battlefield can only enchant something that was already on the battlefield. An Enchant Enchantment returning to the battlefield can't be placed on an enchantment that is also in the process of returning to the battlefield.

card.name: Compulsion
card.ability:
{1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Compulsion: Draw a card.

card.name: Coral Net
card.ability:
Enchant green or white creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you discard a card."

card.name: Crackling Club
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
Sacrifice Crackling Club: Crackling Club deals 1 damage to target creature.
card.flavor: It adds injury to injury.

card.name: Crazed Firecat
card.ability: When Crazed Firecat enters the battlefield, flip a coin until you lose a flip. Put a +1/+1 counter on Crazed Firecat for each flip you win.
card.flavor:
"The longer it's caged, the madder it gets."
—Firecat handler

card.name: Crippling Fatigue
card.ability:
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Flashback—{1}{B}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Dawn of the Dead
card.ability:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : The creature is only exiled if it is still on the battlefield at the beginning of the end step.
8/1/2008 : If the creature leaves the battlefield, but returns to the battlefield before the triggered ability resolves, you won't exile it. This is because it is treated as a different object than the one to which the ability refers.

card.name: Deep Analysis
card.ability:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

card.name: Devastating Dreams
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Devastating Dreams, discard X cards at random.
Each player sacrifices X lands. Devastating Dreams deals X damage to each creature.
card.flavor: Kamahl dreams of storms of fire.

card.name: Dwell on the Past
card.ability: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
card.flavor:
None can find what hasn't been lost.
—Nantuko teaching

card.name: Enslaved Dwarf
card.ability: {R}, Sacrifice Enslaved Dwarf: Target black creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
card.flavor: Captive dwarves always regain their freedom, either through escape or through a desperate, fiery death.

card.name: Equal Treatment
card.ability:
If any source would deal 1 or more damage to a creature or player this turn, it deals 2 damage to that creature or player instead.
Draw a card.

card.name: Faceless Butcher
card.ability:
When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile target creature other than Faceless Butcher.
When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
card.ruling: 9/25/2006 : Three Faceless Butchers cast in succession with no other creatures on the battlefield will result in an infinite loop and the game will be a draw, unless a player somehow interrupts the loop.

card.name: False Memories
card.ability: Put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard. At the beginning of the next end step, exile seven cards from your graveyard.
card.flavor:
"My enemies will forget everything but their anguish."
—Ambassador Laquatus

card.name: Far Wanderings
card.ability:
Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fiery Temper
card.ability:
Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Madness {R} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Flaming Gambit
card.ability:
Flaming Gambit deals X damage to target player. That player may choose a creature he or she controls and have Flaming Gambit deal that damage to it instead.
Flashback {X}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Flash of Defiance
card.ability:
Green creatures and white creatures can't block this turn.
Flashback—{1}{R}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Floating Shield
card.ability:
Enchant creature
As Floating Shield enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Floating Shield.
Sacrifice Floating Shield: Target creature gains protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Frantic Purification
card.ability:
Destroy target enchantment.
Madness {W} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
card.flavor: By definition, madness ends in one of two ways: clarity . . . or death.

card.name: Ghostly Wings
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
Discard a card: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gloomdrifter
card.ability:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Gloomdrifter has "When Gloomdrifter enters the battlefield, nonblack creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn."

card.name: Gravegouger
card.ability:
When Gravegouger enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
When Gravegouger leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Grim Lavamancer
card.ability: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."
card.ruling: 9/22/2011 : The two cards are exiled as the cost of Grim Lavamancer's ability is paid. Players can't respond to the paying of costs by trying to move those cards to another zone.

card.name: Grotesque Hybrid
card.ability:
Whenever Grotesque Hybrid deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Discard a card: Grotesque Hybrid gains flying and protection from green and from white until end of turn.

card.name: Gurzigost
card.ability:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Gurzigost unless you put two cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
{G}{G}, Discard a card: You may have Gurzigost assign its combat damage this turn as though it weren't blocked.
card.ruling:
4/1/2008 : You decide how it will assign its damage at the time the ability resolves. This will be prior to actually assigning combat damage.
4/1/2008 : If this creature is attacking a planeswalker, assigning its damage as though it weren't blocked means the damage is assigned to the planeswalker, not to the defending player.

card.name: Hell-Bent Raider
card.ability:
First strike, haste
Discard a card at random: Hell-Bent Raider gains protection from white until end of turn.
card.flavor: He doesn't slow until his spear is weighted with corpses.

card.name: Hydromorph Guardian
card.ability: {U}, Sacrifice Hydromorph Guardian: Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures you control.
card.flavor: In front of every strong leader is a pool of loyal bodyguards.

card.name: Hydromorph Gull
card.ability:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Hydromorph Gull: Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures you control.
card.flavor:
"The only kind of water that should fly through the air is rain."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Hypnox
card.ability:
Flying
When Hypnox enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all cards from target opponent's hand.
When Hypnox leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Hypochondria
card.ability:
{W}, Discard a card: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{W}, Sacrifice Hypochondria: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Ichorid
card.ability:
Haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ichorid.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ichorid is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than Ichorid from your graveyard. If you do, return Ichorid to the battlefield.

card.name: Insidious Dreams
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Insidious Dreams, discard X cards.
Search your library for X cards. Then shuffle your library and put those cards on top of it in any order.
card.flavor: Chainer dreams of ultimate knowledge.

card.name: Insist
card.ability:
The next creature spell you cast this turn can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"Finesse is no match for brute force."
—Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Invigorating Falls
card.ability: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
card.flavor: Krosan druids do not fear death, for they know that nature will only prosper from their passing.

card.name: Kamahl's Sledge
card.ability:
Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to target creature.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to that creature and 4 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Krosan Constrictor
card.ability:
Swampwalk
{T}: Target black creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
"It's a slithering, coldblooded menace. I've gotta respect that."
—Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Krosan Restorer
card.ability:
{T}: Untap target land.
Threshold — {T}: Untap up to three target lands. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Laquatus's Champion
card.ability:
When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life.
When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life.
{B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.
card.flavor: Chainer's dark gift to a darker soul.

card.name: Last Laugh
card.ability:
Whenever a permanent other than Last Laugh is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Last Laugh deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
When no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Last Laugh.

card.name: Liquify
card.ability: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 3 or less. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Llawan, Cephalid Empress
card.ability:
When Llawan, Cephalid Empress enters the battlefield, return all blue creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands.
Your opponents can't cast blue creature spells.

card.name: Longhorn Firebeast
card.ability: When Longhorn Firebeast enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 5 damage to him or her. If a player does, sacrifice Longhorn Firebeast.
card.flavor: Its blast can fuse armor to bone, leaving skeletons that glint brightly in the sun.

card.name: Major Teroh
card.ability:
Flying
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Major Teroh: Exile all black creatures.
card.flavor: "I am the holy wind that shall avenge the Cabal's victims."

card.name: Mesmeric Fiend
card.ability:
When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Militant Monk
card.ability:
Vigilance
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Mind Sludge
card.ability: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.
card.flavor: When you get into the swamp, the swamp gets into you.

card.name: Morningtide
card.ability: Exile all cards from all graveyards.
card.flavor:
"The spirits of the righteous shall rise into the sky. Even dirtwalkers will fly like aven."
—Major Teroh

card.name: Mortal Combat
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, if twenty or more creature cards are in your graveyard, you win the game.
card.flavor: The crowd roared, the fighters bled, and the dead piled high in the pits. Only the Cabal could win.
card.ruling:
7/15/2007 : you don't have twenty or more creature cards in your graveyard by the time your upkeep starts, the ability won't trigger that turn.
7/15/2007 : Mortal Combat's ability has an "intervening 'if' clause," so the condition is checked again when the triggered ability resolves. If you don't still have twenty creature cards in your graveyard, the ability does nothing.

card.name: Mortiphobia
card.ability:
{1}{B}, Discard a card: Exile target card from a graveyard.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Mortiphobia: Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Mutilate
card.ability: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
card.flavor:
"They appreciate my handiwork. I hear their joy in every scream."
—Chainer, dementia master
card.ruling: 7/1/2012 : The effect is based on the number of Swamps you control when Mutilate resolves. Only creatures on the battlefield at that time will be affected. The effect won't change later in the turn, even if the number of Swamps you control changes.

card.name: Mystic Familiar
card.ability:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Familiar gets +1/+1 and has protection from black.
card.flavor: They soar, and the mystics follow.

card.name: Nantuko Blightcutter
card.ability:
Protection from black
Threshold — Nantuko Blightcutter gets +1/+1 for each black permanent your opponents control as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Calmer
card.ability:
{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Nantuko Calmer: Destroy target enchantment.
Threshold — Nantuko Calmer gets +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Cultivator
card.ability: When Nantuko Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Nantuko Cultivator and draw that many cards.

card.name: Nantuko Shade
card.ability: {B}: Nantuko Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor:
"If the Nantuko only knew what awaits them beyond death, they would abandon all they hold dear."
—Cabal Patriarch

card.name: Narcissism
card.ability:
{G}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{G}, Sacrifice Narcissism: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Nostalgic Dreams
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Nostalgic Dreams, discard X cards.
Return X target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Nostalgic Dreams.
card.flavor: Seton dreams of life renewed.

card.name: Obsessive Search
card.ability:
Draw a card.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
card.flavor: The question strained his sanity. The answer snapped it in half.

card.name: Organ Grinder
card.ability: {T}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Target player loses 3 life.
card.flavor: It knows what makes you tick. It knows how to make the ticking stop.

card.name: Overmaster
card.ability:
The next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"Trickery can't defeat raw power."
—Matoc, lavamancer

card.name: Parallel Evolution
card.ability:
For each creature token on the battlefield, its controller puts a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield.
Flashback {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Pardic Arsonist
card.ability: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Pardic Arsonist has "When Pardic Arsonist enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player."
card.flavor: Otaria's epidemic of insanity didn't affect certain barbarians—but no one noticed.

card.name: Pardic Collaborator
card.ability:
First strike
{B}: Pardic Collaborator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: "We've been taught that strength is everything. So how can an alliance with the strongest be a betrayal?"

card.name: Pardic Lancer
card.ability: Discard a card at random: Pardic Lancer gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
card.flavor: He gets to the point right away.

card.name: Pay No Heed
card.ability: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
card.flavor:
"Inhale life. Exhale pain."
—Mystic elder

card.name: Petradon
card.ability:
When Petradon enters the battlefield, exile two target lands.
When Petradon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
{R}: Petradon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Petravark
card.ability:
When Petravark enters the battlefield, exile target land.
When Petravark leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Pitchstone Wall
card.ability:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever you discard a card, you may sacrifice Pitchstone Wall. If you do, return the discarded card from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor: Its material may not be precious, but the minds it protects are.

card.name: Plagiarize
card.ability: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
card.flavor: "Are you thinking what I'm thinking?"
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : If you target yourself, this spell has no useful effect. It will not cause an infinite loop since a replacement effect can't modify the same event more than once. This effect will not modify the draw that it has you perform.
7/15/2007 : You draw the card from your library as normal, not from your opponent's library.
7/15/2007 : If you and your opponent each cast Plagiarize on each other during the same turn, the two spells effectively cancel each other out. You will draw cards when you normally would and so will your opponent.
7/15/2007 : If you target a player whose library is empty, any effect or turn-based action that would cause that player to draw a card will cause you to draw a card instead. It doesn't matter that the other player would be unable to draw.

card.name: Possessed Aven
card.ability:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Aven gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target blue creature."

card.name: Possessed Barbarian
card.ability:
First strike
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Barbarian gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target red creature."

card.name: Possessed Centaur
card.ability:
Trample
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Centaur gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature."

card.name: Possessed Nomad
card.ability:
Vigilance
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Nomad gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature."

card.name: Psychotic Haze
card.ability:
Psychotic Haze deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Putrid Imp
card.ability:
Discard a card: Putrid Imp gains flying until end of turn.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Putrid Imp gets +1/+1 and can't block.

card.name: Pyromania
card.ability:
{1}{R}, Discard a card at random: Pyromania deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice Pyromania: Pyromania deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Radiate
card.ability: Choose target instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single permanent or player. Copy that spell for each other permanent or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those permanents and players.

card.name: Rancid Earth
card.ability:
Destroy target land.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that land and Rancid Earth deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Reborn Hero
card.ability:
Vigilance
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Reborn Hero has "When Reborn Hero dies, you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, return Reborn Hero to the battlefield under your control."
card.ruling: 4/15/2013 : You must already have seven or more cards in your graveyard before Reborn Hero is put into the graveyard in order for its Threshold ability to trigger; you don't include Reborn Hero itself in the count.

card.name: Restless Dreams
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Restless Dreams, discard X cards.
Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor: Braids dreams of dark rebirth.

card.name: Retraced Image
card.ability: Reveal a card in your hand, then put that card onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent.
card.flavor: An army from a soldier, a flock from a bird, a school from a fish . . . a profit from an atrocity.

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.ability:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
card.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.
card.ruling:
7/15/2007 : If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.
9/22/2011 : Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
9/22/2011 : If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

card.name: Seton's Scout
card.ability:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Threshold — Seton's Scout gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Shade's Form
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Shambling Swarm
card.ability: When Shambling Swarm dies, distribute three -1/-1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each -1/-1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a -1/-1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
card.flavor: Chainer's madness personified, it exists only to slaughter the innocent.
card.ruling: 4/1/2008 : The -1/-1 counters you remove don't have to be the same counters put on the creature by Shambling Swarm

card.name: Sickening Dreams
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Sickening Dreams, discard X cards.
Sickening Dreams deals X damage to each creature and each player.
card.flavor: The Patriarch dreams of vile plague.

card.name: Skullscorch
card.ability: Target player discards two cards at random unless that player has Skullscorch deal 4 damage to him or her.
card.flavor:
"A good whack on the head usually has the same effect."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Skywing Aven
card.ability:
Flying
Discard a card: Return Skywing Aven to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: "I am as the wind that bears me: harsh yet gentle, fleeting yet ever-present. Together we fly beyond imagination."

card.name: Slithery Stalker
card.ability:
Swampwalk
When Slithery Stalker enters the battlefield, exile target green or white creature an opponent controls.
When Slithery Stalker leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Sonic Seizure
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Sonic Seizure, discard a card at random.
Sonic Seizure deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Soul Scourge
card.ability:
Flying
When Soul Scourge enters the battlefield, target player loses 3 life.
When Soul Scourge leaves the battlefield, that player gains 3 life.

card.name: Spirit Flare
card.ability:
Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, it deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls.
Flashback—{1}{W}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If either target is illegal when the spell resolves, it will do no damage.

card.name: Stern Judge
card.ability: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Swamp he or she controls.
card.flavor: "How to punish the guilty is up to the Ancestor. Deciding who merits such punishment is up to me."

card.name: Strength of Isolation
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has protection from black.
Madness {W} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
card.flavor: Don't mistake isolation for safety.

card.name: Strength of Lunacy
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has protection from white.
Madness {B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
card.flavor: Don't confuse lunacy with courage.

card.name: Stupefying Touch
card.ability:
Enchant creature
When Stupefying Touch enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be activated.
card.flavor: Just because your eyes are open doesn't mean you're awake.

card.name: Tainted Field
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Isle
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Peak
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Wood
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Temporary Insanity
card.ability: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Teroh's Faithful
card.ability: When Teroh's Faithful enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
card.flavor: The light of reason follows them even into battle.

card.name: Teroh's Vanguard
card.ability:
Flash
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Teroh's Vanguard has "When Teroh's Vanguard enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain protection from black until end of turn."

card.name: Transcendence
card.ability:
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
When you have 20 or more life, you lose the game.
Whenever you lose life, you gain 2 life for each 1 life you lost. (Damage dealt to you causes you to lose life.)
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If your life total is 20 or more and you control an effect that states "you can't lose the game", then an infinite loop is formed. If neither player wants to end the loop by removing one of these two cards from the battlefield, the game ends in a draw.

card.name: Turbulent Dreams
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Turbulent Dreams, discard X cards.
Return X target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
card.flavor: Laquatus dreams of seizing control.

card.name: Unhinge
card.ability:
Target player discards a card.
Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"Don't let your mind wander—it might not come back."
—Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Vengeful Dreams
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Vengeful Dreams, discard X cards.
Exile X target attacking creatures.
card.flavor: Teroh dreams of his enemies' doom.

card.name: Violent Eruption
card.ability:
Violent Eruption deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Madness {1}{R}{R} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : You can't choose zero targets. You must choose at least one target.

card.name: Waste Away
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Waste Away, discard a card.
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Chainer's insanity touched nearly every living thing—including viruses.

card.name: Zombie Trailblazer
card.ability:
Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn.
Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn.
card.flavor: Some zombies are natural-reborn leaders.
